strings.Value: "I see you're settling in just fine."
"What happened to the rest of the Stag Lord's gang?"
{n}Kressle greets you with a grin.{/n} "Hi there, stranger! I'm Irenna, Svetlana's sister. I just arrived recently..."
"So, a bright day to you, and all the best..."
"It's just..." {n}The former bandit shrugs and looks down.{/n} "I want to start a new life. To forget everything from before, even my old name."
"I won't be around here long. Just enough to help Svetlana with her work around the post — I owe her that much. Then I'll be on my way. Still haven't decided where to go, though."
"The remnants of the gang all scattered. I'd wager someone's already announced himself as the new Stag Lord and got a knife in the liver from some other wannabe heir..."

"Right after the {d|c11 Akiros ally}battle{/d} in the Stag Lord's fortress, Akiros just... dissolved, like morning fog. I heard him mumble something about repaying old debts as he left. He's no fool — I'd guess he won't show his face in {g|Stolen Lands}the Stolen Lands{/g} again. Too many people recognize him for being the Stag Lord's right hand."

"There was a young trader got slaughtered recently on a nearby road. I'd bet anything it was {d|c11 Dovan lives}Dovan's{/d} doing — I recognize his style just from the description. If we're lucky, we won't hear any more from the fellow. Otherwise, well... I, for one, intend to keep a sword at my side during the day and a dagger under my pillow while I sleep."

"As for Akiros, some investigators all the way from {g|Taldor}Taldor{/g} came here after him. Said they've been trailing him for a long time. And he just {d|c11 Akiros Surrendered}walked out{/d} to them, smiling like they were best friends — said he was tired of running from the past. He just turned himself in. Where they took him and what happened after — no clue."
